title: Jacob and Esau Reconcile
summary: Genesis 33 tells of the peaceful reunion between Jacob and Esau. Contrary to Jacob’s fears, Esau embraces him. Jacob declines Esau’s offer to travel together and settles in Shechem.

faq.question: How did Esau receive Jacob?
faq.answer: With love and forgiveness—he ran to him and embraced him.

faq.question: Where did Jacob settle afterward?
faq.answer: He settled near Shechem in Canaan.
